page.title: 11EVENTS FERNDOWN NEWS
page.content: Recent local events in the{news include the following items. In May there was a bad{heath fire}near our school which killed many plants and creatures. Ian Joyce, age 10, was knocked off his bicycle and taken to Poole hospital. (He is better now and will return to school soon.) In June the Ferndown Squash Club held their annual championships at the{Sports {Centre.}There was traffic chaos in the centre of town when work began at the crossroads. Back in April the{Tanner {quads}had their tenth birthday. They are the only known set of girl quads with two sets of identical twins. This week we have our School sports day. On the 13 July my trampolining club are entering an open competition in Portsmouth. The fathers of two children in my class were in a TV quiz show called Ultra Quiz.
